column2: an A.M. Eatery////Good place for brunch!  We were meeting some friends here and because I've been burned by not checking the Yelp waitlist before
column3: I had the right mind to check it this time and scheduled our wait in line for the time that we were planning to make it there.  Parked
column4: got the text that our table was ready
column5: and walked in immediately to our table - couldn't have gone smoother than that honestly.  The wait was getting up to an hour by the time we got there.
